doc.field: Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello

This series contains photographs ranging from 4"x6" to 8"x10" which include formal portraits, images of George Bugliarello attending University events, a series of photographs of MetroTech construction and a series of photographs of a Russian delegation visit to the Polytechnic campus. The slides depict MetroTech construction, text, and figures used by George Bugliarello for presentations.
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
